bio: Mike Deodato Jr. is a Brazilian comic book artist who is known for his work in the superhero and fantasy genres. He has worked for a number of major comic book publishers, including Marvel Comics, DC Comics, and Image Comics, and has illustrated numerous popular series, including "The Avengers," "Wonder Woman," and "The Incredible Hulk." Deodato is known for his dynamic, highly detailed artwork, and his ability to capture the action and emotion of his subjects. He has received numerous accolades for his work, and is widely respected within the comic book industry. Deodato continues to work as a comic book artist to this day, and is known for his ability to bring his characters and stories to life with his dynamic, expressive artwork.
